kyc-verify-subtitle: Verify your identity to access all Socious features
kyc-desc: Socious uses blockchain technology to make credentials transparent and traceable.
kyc-partner: We’ve partnered with Atala Prism through which your decentralized ID can receive verifiable credentials.
kyc-step-1: 1. Go through the app’s onboarding process which will create a decentralized ID on Atala Prism.
kyc-step-2: 2. Verify your identity with Veriff, our KYC partner.
